title: Ultimate skins
body: Will the ultimate skins ever go on sale?? I want to pick up spirit guard udyr but I would rather it be on sale than not.

replies.body: i want spirit guard so bad ;-;

I'm currently sitting on a SGU and PFE skin shard with Hextec crafting. Not very difficult to turn them into permanent skins.

I already have the three Ultimate skins anyway, so when I get a DJS shard I'll be crafting the trinity together.
